external_games.name: a phone found in tall grass

name: A Phone Found in Tall Grass
summary:
a phone found in tall grass is an experimental visual novel made in one month. There are no choices and should take between ten and twenty minutes to read.

It tells the story of an apocalypse and three aimless 20-something adults stuck in the middle, via tweets. Read the latest news! Shitpost while hurtling towards oblivion! Tell your closest friends how much you love them!
